name: TC-21-P :: Add a Product to the Wishlist

actions.action: Enter the product name e.g. "Hummingbird printed t-shirt" into the "Search" input box.
actions.expectedResult: The product name is successfully entered in the search box.

actions.action: Press the "Enter" key or click the search icon to submit.
actions.expectedResult: The search results page is loaded and displays the product.

actions.action: Click the visible "heart" icon (Add to Wishlist button) on the specific product card.
actions.expectedResult: A list for selecting a wishlist appears.
A success message "Product added" appears at the top of the page.
